text: Imaginative playground and extensive exercise equipment. But the insides of some of the playground tunnels are rusty or accumulated some sort of dirt.

Not well kept as I would have expected especially since this area has a lot of elderly moving around. I brought my 2 boys to play and felt so sick of the dirt and rubbish that was lying around. I did see a Town Council worker sweeping at one side but felt that the playground hasn't been maintained for a long time. Giving a fancy name as sensory park is just not enough. Do maintain it.

Good place to take a stroll, exercise and bring your family along! There are facilities for everyone of all ages. So take not there isn't a public toilet in the park but at the nearest hawker centre nearby.
Quite a serene place though surrounded by HDB blocks.  It has it's own characteristics such as the echo pieces and tall bamboo trees.

It is a good place for people to relax and for children to explore. It has plenty of shade to keep away from the heat during a hot sunny day. However, the park needs an upkeep and maintenance to keep it clean and pleasant.
